Related tasklist tests are also failing.  Investigating...
Test failures simply due to a partial fix of a bug on my end, and fixed now.  Could you please update and let me know if you still see these errors?

The errors are gone. 

The "Report as Bug" feature is really cool. I hope someone requests a rich editor for creating new Trac tasks soon :).
He he, yup, would be great to have that for Trac.  It's really great how our generic tasks framework and UI is coming together :)

The error showed up again. It occured when I opened up the task list during startup which I have minimized to "Fast View" mode by default. Mylar was still synchronizing queries and possibly still loading/restoring the context of the last active task. 

On a second startup I couldn't reproduce the error so there seems to be some race condition involved. I'll investigate this further tomorrow.
Don't worry about investigating it, it's on my plate.
Steffen: please let me know if you see this with the latest.
I just replicated it via startup with fast view.  Investigating.
Fixed--there was a bug related to lazy loading when the Tasks UI did not start.  Btw, are you running on 3.3M1 or 3.2?
